member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODE_REFERENCE_FRAMES
member.summary: Represents the reconstructed reference images for an encoding operation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODE_REFERENCE_FRAMES.NumTexture2Ds
member.summary: The number of textures in the ppTexture2Ds array.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODE_REFERENCE_FRAMES.ppTexture2Ds
member.summary: An array of textures containing the reference images.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODE_REFERENCE_FRAMES.pSubresources
member.summary: An array of subresource indices for the reference textures specified in ppTexture2Ds. NULL indicates that subresource 0 should be assumed for each resource. With texture arrays within a single resource, the subresource indices point to the array index of the first resource plane. With an array of textures in individual resources, the subresource index is typically zero.
